elements.name: Verify user is able to log in and log out successfully

steps.name: User clicks on Signup or Login button
I should see Login to your account
I enter valid email "testuser23@test.com" and password "Akshay2001@"
I click on the Login button
I should see Logged in as "Testuser"
I click on the Logout button
I should be navigated back to the login page
User is on the homepage

elements.name: Verify user cannot register with an already registered email

steps.name: User clicks on Signup or Login button
User should see New User Signup! text
User enters name "Akshay" and already registered email "bollamakshay756@gmail.com"
User clicks on the Signup button
User should see an error message "Email Address already exist!"
User is on the homepage

elements.name: User submits the contact form successfully

steps.name: I navigate to the Contact Us page
I should see the GET IN TOUCH heading
I fill in the contact form with details
I upload a file
I click the Submit button and accept the alert
I should see the success message Success! Your details have been submitted successfully.
I click the Home button
I should be redirected to the home page
User is on the homepage

elements.name: User navigates to the Test Cases page successfully

steps.name: I click on the Test Cases button
I should be redirected to the Test Cases page
User is on the homepage

elements.name: User successfully subscribes using different emails

steps.name: I scroll down to the Subscription section
I enter my email "user1@test.com" and click subscribe
I should see the success message You have been successfully subscribed!
User is on the homepage

elements.name: User adds a recommended item to the cart and verifies it

User clicks Add To Cart on a recommended product
User clicks View Cart button
The product should be displayed in the cart
User is on the homepage

elements.name: User verifies scroll up and scroll down on home page

steps.name: I should see the home page
I scroll down to the bottom of the page
I should see Subscription text
I click on the button arrow button
I should see expectedText on screen
User is on the homepage

elements.name: Verify product removal from cart

I add a product to the cart
click continue shopping

I remove a product from the cart

elements.name: Verify category navigation for Women and Men products

I click on the Women category
I click on the Dress sub-category under Women

I click on the Men category
I click on the Jeans sub-category under Men
I should see the MEN - JEANS PRODUCTS page

elements.name: Register and complete checkout process

steps.name: User clicks on Signup or Login button
I enter signup details with name "John Doenc" and email "johndoe14978@example.com"
I enter account details with password "password123", day "10", month "January", year "1990"
I enter address details "John", "Doe", "Company", "123 Street", "Apt 4B", "United States", "California", "Los Angeles", "90001", "1234567890"

I proceed with checkout
